name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during a sandstorm, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.
